00012         function open($action, $method, $options=array()){
00013                 $action = baseUrl($action);
00014                 $form = '<form action="'.sEscape::html($action).'" method="'.sEscape::html($method).'" ';
00015                 $form .= $this->_getOptions($options);
00016                 $form.= ' >';
00017                 echo $form;
00018         }

00027                 $options['enctype'] = 'multipart/form-data';

00073         function textArea($name, $size, $content, $options=array()){
00074                 $size = strtolower($size);
00075                 $size = explode('x', $size);
00076                 if(count($size) != 2){
00077                         throw new Exception('Size must be ROWSxCOLS which is [int]x[int]');
00078                 }
00079                 $form = '<textarea name="'.sEscape::html($name).'" id="'.sEscape::html($name).'" rows="'.sEscape::html($size[0]).'" cols="'.sEscape::html($size[1]).'" ';
00080                 $form .= $this->_getOptions($options);
00081                 $form.= ' >'.sEscape::html($content).'</textarea>';
00082                 echo $form;
00083         }

00215         function selectBox($name, $valuesArray, $selected, $options=array()){
00216                 $form = '<select name="'.sEscape::html($name).'" id="'.sEscape::html($name).'">';
00217                 foreach($valuesArray as $value=>$content){
00218                         $form .= '<option value="'.sEscape::html($value).'"';
00219                         if($selected === $value){
00220                                 $form .= ' selected = "selected" ';
00221                         }
00222                         $form .= '>'.sEscape::html($content).'</option>';
00223                 }
00224                 $form .= '</select>';
00225                 echo $form;
00226         }

00231         function  close(){
00232                 $form = '</form>';
00233                 echo $form;

00240         private function _checkOptions($options){
00241                 if(!is_array($options)){
00242                         throw new Exception('Options must be an array!');
00243                 }
00244         }
00245 
00251         private function _getOptions($options){
00252                 $this->_checkOptions($options);
00253                 $form = ' ';
00254                 foreach($options as $attribute=>$value){
00255                         $form .= sEscape::html($attribute) . '="'.sEscape::html($value).'" ';
00256                 }
00257                 return $form.' ';
00258         }
